title: Mystery gifting text
body:
I sent a gift last night to a friend but I completely screwed up the text (added words that werent meant to be there by accidently CTRL+V'ing etc)
and was wondering if there is a way to change it!
Thanks in advance
(Tell me if im on the wrong board/tab so I can delete the post and post it on the correct one)

Cheers{{champion:19}}

replies.body: Hopefully, the recipient won't mind but you can always let them know.  Beyond the confirmations of processing the gift, there's no edit of a gift message after it's been sent.  Hopefully, the recipient won't mind but you can always let them know.   Let me know if you have any questions.
